DOC.detailed_description: Approximately 560 subject randomly enrol 1:1 ratio , patient experimental group receive NeoVas BCS ( Lepu Medical Technology ( Beijing ) Co. , Ltd ) , subject control group receive XIENCE PRIME EECSS ( Abbott Vascular , Inc ) . Subjects clinical follow-up 30 , 90 , 180 270 day 1,2,3,4 5 year . All subject undergo coronary angiography 1 year post-index procedure . The primary endpoint in-segment late lumen loss ( LLL ) 1 year follow-up . Among RCT study , subgroup study design evaluate functional recovery vasomotion complete degradation NeoVas Bioresorbable Coronary Scaffold aid angiography , OCT FFR . The subgroup study perform two center 160 subject enrol 1:1 randomization basis . Subjects receive angiography OCT examination procedure , receive angiography , OCT FFR procedure 1 , 3 year follow-up .
